headline: Rivian, Magna International, And Akamai Are Among the Top 10 Large-Cap Gainers Last Week (Feb. 9-Feb. 13): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
summary: Large-cap gainers were led by Magna, Rivian, and Generac after strong Q4 results and upbeat 2026 guidance, while QXO jumped on its Kodiak deal and Akamai/Vertiv rose on guidance plus analyst upgrades.

raw.headline: Rivian, Magna International, And Akamai Are Among the Top 10 Large-Cap Gainers Last Week (Feb. 9-Feb. 13): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?

headline: Generac Transformation Extends Into Data Centers And Smart Home Energy
summary: Generac Holdings (NYSE:GNRC) has acquired Allmand, expanding its commercial and industrial equipment footprint. The company is moving deeper into data center infrastructure, including pilot programs with hyperscale customers. Generac is investing in smart home and AI-integrated energy management solutions alongside a share repurchase authorization. Generac Holdings, long associated with backup generators, is repositioning itself as a broader energy technology company. The Allmand...
